entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
